resources.string: Hi! I\'m an enthousiastic programmer and love I playing videogames. In my spare time I make my own videogame and go out with friends.

Name: Jasper Bonefaas
Phone number: +31 6 37347971
Email address: Jasper.bonefaas@gmail.com
Address: Flierstraat 39, Breda
In a group of 6 people we learned how to program a weather station.
6 persons, 3 boebots and 1 goal. We made a robot capable of following lines, stopping for walls, listening to a remote and responding with leds.
Who likes to party!? In this project we made a festival planning program. It\'s function was to simulate AI\'s with pathfindding algorithems.
A day at the theme park, who doesn\'t love it? In this project we made an Android application and used an Arduino to make an \'experience\'.
For Android Programming and UX designe we made an awesome app. It contains pictures, recycleviews, translations and a very nice designe!
